parameters.name: HostAccountName
parameters.description:
Indicates whether a password is configured for the host account.

Valid values:

*   true: A password is configured for the host account.
*   false: No passwords are configured for the host account.

parameters.name: HostId
parameters.description:
The protocol used by the host whose accounts you want to query.

Valid values:

*   SSH
*   RDP

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the shared key.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The operation that you want to perform.

Set the value to **ListHostAccounts**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page.

Maximum value: 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: ProtocolName
parameters.description: The name of the host account that you want to query. The name can be up to 128 characters in length. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the specified host whose accounts you want to query.

>  You can call the [ListHosts](~~200665~~) operation to query the ID of the host.
